author: felix314159_
content: to clarify: this is only for that block 0 case which allows us to easily check these responses before any node is actually started in a devnet. the responses of all live holesky nodes ran by ethpandaops currently are the same which is good, that's why i mentioned that its not urgent

author: raxhvl
content: Would defining a formal json schema help? https://json-schema.org/, this can be easily validated in tests.
